data.title: Rhin, Alsace): tourism, attractions and travel guide for Altkirch
data.meta_description: Visit Altkirch in the Haut-Rhin department (Alsace region) of France: tourist information, places to visit and attractions near Altkirch
data.text:
Altkirch tourism and travel guide

Visit Altkirch: highlights and tourist information

Travel Guide To Visit Attractions Book hotels, car hire, flights

France This Way comment: In the oldest part of Altkirch you can still see part of the defensive walls and a medieval gateway into the town

Altkirch is situated in the Haut-Rhin department and Grand-Est region.

Important note

This page features a summary of highlights that you might like to explore near Altkirch. For detailed visitor information see the Altkirch travel guide.

Below you can see some of the places that we have visited and reviewed and can recommend when you are sightseeing close to Altkirch in Grand-Est.

Popular places to visit nearby include Ottmarsheim at 27 km and Belfort at 28 km.

Altkirch, France: places to visit and attractions

Geography and distances

Altkirch is in the north-east of France at 52 kilometres from Colmar, the department capital (general information: Altkirch is 387 kilometres from Paris).

Geographical Information

Commune: Altkirch

Canton: Altkirch

Arrondissement: Altkirch

Department: Haut-Rhin

Region: Alsace

New region: Grand-Est

Postcode: 68130

Distance to Altkirch

from Colmar (prefecture): 52 km

from Paris: 387 km

from Calais: 538 km

from Nice: 436 km

from Bordeaux: 676 km

from Strasbourg: 113 km

Getting here

Most visitors fly into Paris or drive from one of the channel port - Calais and Dunkirk are around 6 hours distance. For driving distances to Altkirch from anywhere in France see driving distances and route planner.

We have 23 other places listed as being close (less than kilometres from ): Aspach, Ballersdorf, Balschwiller, Bettendorf, Carspach, Eglingen, Emlingen, Heidwiller, Heiwiller, Henflingen, Hirsingue, Hirtzbach, Illfurth, Luemschwiller, Obermorschwiller, Saint-Bernard, Schwoben, Spechbach-le-Bas, Tagolsheim, Tagsdorf, Walheim, Willer and Wittersdorf.
